attributes.action: Restore the English National Anthem whenever ENGLAND are performing worldwide.
attributes.additional_details: I'd like to see Jerusalem (or any of the accepted traditional ENGLISH anthems) restored as the default position as explained; with "God save the King" only being played when competing as BRITAIN/UK or when two Home nations pay each other and in addition to their nation-specific anthems being played (ie Host Team Anthem-Visiting Team Anthem-UK National Anthem).
attributes.background: All too often anyone performing or competing for ENGLAND in any capacity is subjected to the BRITISH National Anthem before kick off or if they're lucky enough to win; This is all the more rediculous when playing Scotland or Wales as they're allowed to sing Nation-specific anthems to no reply...

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the playing of anthems at a sporting event are a matter for the body organising the event and/or the relevant sport's governing body, not the UK Government or Parliament.
